I just caught up with HEAD and ran the test suite without any errors/failures or stack traces in the console. The exception indicates that there is an item in a tree viewer that has no associated data - I'm not sure how that happens.
This could happen if an asynch request to populate had not yet completed.
*** Bug 182944 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
